{{cpp/experimental/unique_resource/title|~unique_resource}}
{{cpp/experimental/unique_resource/navbar}}

{{ddcl | since=libfund_ts_3 |
~unique_resource();
}}

Disposes the resource by calling the deleter with the underlying resource handle if the {{tt|unique_resource}} owns it, equivalent to calling {{lc|reset()}}. Then destroys the stored resource handle and the deleter.
